author: Front
title: Great game
review:
I haven't opened this set yet, so how can I review it ? Well I was part of the team that tested the game while it was developed, so I've built and played with it. It's a real cool game, where you steal gifts (2x2 bricks) from your fellow players. I remember having fun during the test. It's a set that has value because of the play value, and not because of the value of the bricks.

It's a limited release.
